description: This file defines the login screen UI for a Flutter application, allowing users to input username and password, and handles authentication interaction with a provider. It includes form validation, navigation to registration, and shows loading/error states.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing the login screen, managing user input and interactions.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class for LoginScreen, maintains user input state, form key, and UI logic.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login screen, including input fields, buttons, and error/loading state management.
